# `listener` Stanza

The `listener` stanza configures the addresses and ports on which Boundary will
respond to requests. At this time, there are two listeners - [TCP][tcp] and [Unix][unix].

[tcp]: /docs/configuration/listener/tcp
[unix]: /docs/configuration/listener/unix
